T08D4148:252b-0: @252b ` // bslab ba bcu'i cho ga bzhugs //
T08D4148:252b-3: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung
T08D4148:252b-4: nas byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du
T08D4148:252b-5: / rkang gnyis kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T08D4148:252b-6: thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad gzigs pa la skyabs
T08D4148:253a-0: 'dod chags dang bral pa rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su @253a * //
T08D4148:253a-2: tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T08D4148:253a-3: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o zhes ba skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga'o //
T08D4148:253a-5: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung
T08D4148:253a-6: ste sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod
T08D4148:253a-7: pa thams cad dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa thams
T08D4148:253a-8: cad dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T08D4148:253a-12: myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang /
T08D4148:253a-13: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang /
T08D4148:253a-20: rgyan dang kha dog 'chang pa las slar zlog par bgyi'o //
T08D4148:253a-21: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo //
T08D4148:253a-23: sems kyi rgyan gyi phyir dang /
T08D4148:253a-24: sems kyi yo byad kyi phyir dang /
T08D4148:253a-25: don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'grub pa'i slad du /
T08D4148:253a-26: bdag gso sbyong la gnas par slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol /
T08D4148:253a-27: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
T08D4148:253a-28: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang /
T08D4148:253a-29: gso sbyong gi sdom pa'i cho ga'o //
T08D4148:253a-31: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung
T08D4148:253a-32: nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi
T08D4148:253a-33: bar du / srog gcod pa spangs te sog gcod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o //
T08D4148:253a-35: ma byin par len pa dang /
T08D4148:253a-36: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T08D4148:253a-43: log par lta ba las bzlog par bgyi'o //
T08D4148:253a-44: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o zhes pa bslab
T08D4148:253a-45: pa bcu'i cho ga klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas
T08D4148:253a-46: gsungs pa rtse thang lo ts'a ba gzhon nu'i zhabs
